Projects.Name: GenNFT
Projects.Description: An NFT Marketplace built on top of the Polygon Mumbai Testnet where creators can help themselves and others by setting a donation and royalty percentage at the time of minting. Each time an NFT is sold for a profit, the designated royalty percentage and donation percentage is cut from the profit and transferred to the creator and an NGO

Projects.Name: Spotify Clone
Projects.Description: A Spotify clone where users can listen to their choice of music for free, without any ads and even get recommendations

Projects.Name: Internship
Projects.Description: An internship site tailor made for students, where they can give daily quiz and rankup on the leaderboard to standout in front of the recruiters

Projects.Name: Voting DApp
Projects.Description: A simple voting site built on top of the Polygon Mumbai Testnet, where users can vote for their choice of the applicant on the blockchain
